task.title: Installing the Oxygen XML Authoring Tool
task.shortdesc: Installing the Oxygen XML authoring tool.

context.p: Use this procedure to install the trial version of the Oxygen XML authoring tool. Install version 25.0 or later. The trial period is 30 days.

step.cmd: On a browser instance, navigate to www.oxygenxml.com.
From the menu, click Products Oxygen XML Author .

image.alt: Displays a web page with a snapshot of products, including the Oxygen XML Author.

step.stepresult:
The following page displays: Oxygen XML Download
Displays the web page that enables you to download the Oxygen XMLAuthor for the 64-bit operating system.

step.cmd: Select the tab that corresponds to your operating system (here, Windows), and click the Download button.
step.stepresult: The executable (.exe) file downloads to your system.

step.cmd: In the page that displays, enter the required details to obtain your 30-day trial license.

fig.title: Oxygen XML Installation -- Getting the trial license

image.alt: Displays the form to enter the required details to obtain the 30-day trial license.

step.cmd: Double-click the .exe file to invoke the installation wizard for Oxygen XML author.
step.info: Follow the defaults to complete the installation and click Finish when done.

step.cmd: Double-click the shortcut on your desktop to nvoke an instance of the Oxygen XML author.
When prompted, enter the 9-line license text in the space provided.
